title: 代码评审反馈
situation: Giving feedback in a code review. The PR has some issues with error handling and types.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 你看一下这个PR，有问题直接comment。
turns.pinyin: Nǐ kàn yīxià zhège PR, yǒu wèntí zhíjiē comment.
turns.translation: Take a look at this PR, comment directly if you see issues.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 这个函数没有处理异常，建议加try-catch，并且把错误日志打到Sentry。
turns.pinyin: Zhège hánshù méiyǒu chǔlǐ yìcháng, jiànyì jiā try-catch, bìngqiě bǎ cuòwù rìzhì dǎ dào Sentry.
turns.translation: This function doesn't handle exceptions — suggest adding try-catch and logging errors to Sentry.
suggestions: 这个函数没有处理异常，建议加try-catch，并且把错误日志打到Sentry。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 类型定义这块你看有问题吗？
turns.pinyin: Lèixíng dìngyì zhè kuài nǐ kàn yǒu wèntí ma?
turns.translation: Any issues with the type definitions?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 有几个any可以改成泛型，TypeScript会推断得更准确。
turns.pinyin: Yǒu jǐ ge any kěyǐ gǎi chéng fànxíng, TypeScript huì tuīduàn dé gèng zhǔnquè.
turns.translation: A few `any`s could be replaced with generics for better TypeScript inference.
suggestions: 有几个any可以改成泛型，TypeScript会推断得更准确。
